main_definition: Originally, Ferrari refers to a prestigious Italian sports car manufacturer, but it has also become an informal idiom used in English referring to anything that is elite or high-end.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An Italian luxury sports car brand
meanings_and_examples.example: His new Ferrari 488 GTB made a grand entrance at the auto show.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Something of exceptional quality or high status
meanings_and_examples.example: Attending this exclusive party felt like I was in a world of Ferraris, with every luxury detail catered to our needs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used informally to describe something that is impressive and top-tier or elite
meanings_and_examples.example: His achievements at the university were nothing short of a Ferrari in his field of study.
